Description_lang: Transform into a powerful skeletal mage for $d. While in the form of a skeletal mage, your Frostbolt, Fireball, and Arcane Blast hit up to $s4 enemies near your target and your spell damage is increased by $s2%.
AuraDescription_lang: Transformed into a powerful skeletal mage, greatly enhancing your Frostbolt, Fireball, and Arcane Blast and increasing your spell damage by $w2%.
